content: this quick and easy breezy mesh tee suits an adventurous beginner to intermediate level crocheter a great project for a first garment in a versatile cotton yarn **techniques include ** treble and triple treble stitches treble decreases working between posts double_crochet edging and flat slip_stitch seams pattern written in 3 languages **english - uk terms english - us terms dutch** **sizing & finished bust measurements ** xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl 4xl 5xl sizes to measure 85 95 105 115 125 135 145 155 165 cm actual bust of finished garment and 59 59 59 62 62 62 65 65 65 cm actual length of finished garment **pdfs feature ** - written instructions - measurement chart and schematic - swatching instructions and photos to check gauge - wip photos to support written instructions - links to blog tutorials on my website for techniques relevant to the pattern note - my blog is written in english and uses uk terms **materials ** yarn scheepjes skies light 100% premium cotton 100g/340m colour 110 cirrus x 3 3 3 3 4 4 4 5 5 skeins includes yarn for 1 swatch 12g or scheepjes cotton 8 100% premium cotton 50g/170m colour 714 x 5 5 6 6 7 7 8 9 9 balls includes yarn for 1 swatch 12g hooks 3 5mm 4mm other stitch markers - 4 **alternative yarns ** pattern is written for scheepjes skies light premium cotton and cotton 8 yarns but is also suitable to make in scheepjes organic or sunkissed yarns as they are all cottons with the same yardage 100g/340m further pattern support via email susan@peppergoose design
